title: Pixel 3XL does not download system upgrades when tethered to another mobile phone. Solution?
content: When tethered to another mobile device, the internet on the 3XL works perfectly except for downloading a system upgrade. Does the 3XL detect that its wifi connection is coming from a mobile device and therefore blocks the download so as to save the data on the other mobile device? If so, can it be unblocked?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
